DOC.brief_summary: The use airway management strategy different type supraglottic airway device ( SAD ) transurethral resection bladder ureteroscopy urological surgery . Classical laryngeal mask airway ( LMA-C ) I-Gel SADs use already . DOC.brief_title: Comparison I-gel LMA , Classical LMA With New Supraglottic Airway Baska Mask® Urological Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The use airway management strategy different type supraglottic airway device ( SAD ) transurethral resection bladder ureteroscopy urological surgery . Classical laryngeal mask airway ( LMA-C ) I-Gel SADs use already . The aim study evaluate compare performance new type SAD Baska Mask® I-gel LMA-C regard insertion time , duration , perioperative complication effect hemodynamic parameter , peak airway pressure ( Paw ) airway plato pressure urological surgery well . The main suggestion Baska Mask® 's appropriate airway device high Paws . In high Paws , high air leak may occur side cuff cause hypoventilation . So main aim study evaluate compare effect three type -I-gel , , Baska Mask® LMA-C- SADs regard effect Paw , Airway plato pressure , Tidal volume , air leak volume . The secondary aim observe compare effect hemodynamic parameter , insertion time , ease insertion perioperative complication .
DOC.criteria: ( ASA ) 123 physical status schedule elective surgical procedure transurethral resection bladder ureteroscopy . Under age 18 , history hiatus hernia , gastroesophageal reflux , body mass index ( BMI ) > 30 kg m2 , ASA physical status 4 patient meet difficult intubation criterion .
